means: sea ： 普通用词，可用复数形式表单数意义。sea所指的面积要比ocean小得多。sea也可是ocean的一部分。
ocean ： 指把海作为一个整体，是海洋的总称，不可数名词，指大洋时是可数名词。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French occean, via Latin from Greek ōkeanos 'great stream encircling the earth's disc'. ‘The ocean’ originally denoted the whole body of water regarded as encompassing the earth's single land mass

example.ex: There were few sights as beautiful as the calm ocean on a warm night.
example.tran: 鲜有景致能与温暖夜色下风平浪静的大海媲美。

entry.def: An ocean is one of the five very large areas of sea on the Earth's surface.

example.ex: They spent many days cruising the northern Pacific Ocean.
example.tran: 他们在北太平洋航行了很多天。

entry.def: If you say that there is an ocean of something, you are emphasizing that there is a very large amount of it.

example.ex: I had cried oceans of tears...
APEC seems be drowning in an ocean of jargon.
example.tran: 亚太经合组织似乎为一大堆空洞的胡言乱语所淹没。

entry.def: If you say that something is a drop in the ocean, you mean that it is a very small amount which is unimportant compared to the cost of other things or is so small that it has very little effect on something.

example.ex: His fee is a drop in the ocean compared with the real cost of broadcasting.
example.tran: 同播出的实际开支相比较，他那点酬金不过是九牛一毛。

means.word_mean: 1. a large body of water constituting a principal part of the hydrosphere
2. anything apparently limitless in quantity or volume

Sentence.sentence: The high cost of steam and the lesser need for speed kept the majority of the world's ocean freight moving by sail until the early years of the 20th century.

sentences.en: One afternoon, she went for a swim in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 一天下午她到海里去游泳。

sentences.en: As we've seen, oceans cover more than 70％ of the earth.
sentences.cn: 据我们所知, 海洋占地球面积的70％以上。

jushi.english: Heronomus contends that an electricity generator making use of ocean heat would be economically competitive with conventional sources.
jushi.chinese: 赫隆若马斯坚持认为:利用海洋热能发电在经济上比传统能源有竞争性。

jushi.english: To go from Britain to America you have to cross the Atlantic (Ocean).
jushi.chinese: 从英国到美国去必须越过大西洋。

jushi.english: The luxury ocean liner is sailing for America.
jushi.chinese: 那条豪华的远洋客轮正驶向美国。
